text: Ketchapp is an French video game company that specializes in mobile games. The company's first game was Chilly Rush. Founded in 2014 by brothers Antoine and Michel Morcos, the company first came into the public eye later that year, through its port of the open-source game 2048. When Ketchapp was acquired by Ubisoft in September 2016, the company had more than 700 million downloads across their portfolio of games. By 2020, KetchApp had released over 200 games. == References == Category:Companies based in Paris
title: Ketchapp
